title: Alire: Ada Has a Package Manager
abstract: Alire (Ada LIbrary REpository) is a package manager project for the Ada/SPARK community. The goal of a package manager is to facilitate collaboration within the community and to lower the barrier of entry for beginners.
description:
In this talk we will present the Alire project, what it can do for you and how you can contribute and give more visibility to your Ada/SPARK projects.

We will also provide a tutorial to show how to use Alire to create a library and then publish it for others to use.
